Text.Page:
Our scouts followed up on some of the other maps you recovered and found a strange, red structure near the center of Kaidun's base.

Sihran forces chased them off before they could examine it too closely. I need you to bring back a piece of it...or destroy it if need be.
(With a few well-placed strikes, a small fragment of the structure breaks off.)

Interesting. This is all you could chip off? The sorcerers in the rear camp will have to look carefully at this.

Good work, .
